name: Steven Daniels
body:
### About Steven Daniels

Husband, father, full-stack Ruby/Javascript developer. 

I currently work at [GiveCampus](https://www.givecampus.com) as a software engineer.

I maintain a couple Ruby gems, [roo](https://github.com/roo-rb/roo) a spreadsheet reader, and [Zhongwen Tools](https://github.com/stevendaniels/zhongwen_tools).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
